tasks.text: Get knowing about the project and start local environment.
Start the first sprint25, get first four tasks. And have three free days, the International Worker's Day.
Finish coding of the first sprint25 tasks. Weekend. Pick up the girl at Institute of Technology on Saturday. Take her to school on Sunday.
Finish sprint25. Start sprint 26 but the task is intriguing and flexible. Api score task. Weekend. See a teacher at MinHang. Go to have dinner. Take the girl to airport. See a girl.
Start learn HTML5, CSS, JS video. And fix some api score issue.
Finish nps weekly email on Monday, hospital on Tuesday, new tasks on Wednesday.
